Description:
Responsibilities:Design and Development: Design and develop innovative and efficient mechanical products and systems based on client requirements and industry standards.
Analysis and Testing: Analyze mechanical systems using modeling, simulation methods, and conduct tests to verify their performance.
Performance Enhancement: Improve the performance of existing mechanical products and systems by developing enhancements and modifications.
Production Guidance: Provide technical guidance and assistance to production teams for manufacturing products sustainably and with high quality.
Documentation Preparation: Prepare technical drawings, documentation, and test reports to support manufacturing and assembly processes.
Innovation: Develop new and creative solutions to enhance performance and meet customer requirements.
Project Management: Manage mechanical projects from planning to execution and monitoring.
Maintenance and Support: Provide technical support and solutions for maintenance and mechanical issue resolution.
Compliance and Safety: Ensure designs and products comply with industry standards and safety guidelines.Skills
Skills:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field. Higher qualifications or relevant professional certifications are advantageous.
Technical Knowledge: Deep understanding of mechanical engineering principles, design, and analysis.
Modeling and Simulation Skills: Proficiency in using modeling and simulation tools to analyze the performance of mechanical systems.
Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills to interact with team members, clients, and collaborators.
Problem-Solving: Ability to analyze complex challenges and develop logical and effective solutions.
Creativity: Ability to think creatively and develop innovative solutions.
Project Management: Experience in project management and the ability to work within schedules and budgets.
Safety Understanding: Strong understanding of safety principles and compliance with relevant guidelines.
